threads: Ridiculous how our energy prices keep rising while we're busy funding endless wars and foreign interventions. Time to prioritize AMERICA and our people! 🇺🇸
text: lol imagine thinking funding wars is the issue. nah, we're bleeding cash on useless climate agreements & immigration. gotta cut off the real parasites & put america first. wake up or stay a sheep. 🐑🇺🇸
